name: lorban
cooked: If the JDS is an independent service, then we must take into account the fact that can service for different pools. In this setting, I think that each pool must communicate the JDS the coinbase outputs and each miner must communicate the pool that it is working for. Apart from this, seems to work exactly as it currently working in the SRI.
raw: If the JDS is an independent service, then we must take into account the fact that can service for different pools. In this setting, I think that each pool must communicate the JDS the coinbase outputs and each miner must communicate the pool that it is working for. Apart from this, seems to work exactly as it currently working in the SRI.
